carpet.rule.pcaProtocolEnabled.desc: Synchronizes Entities and BlockEntities to the client.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.desc: Determines which player's data can be synchronized.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.0: NOBODY: No player data can be synchronized.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.1: BOT: Data of summoned bots can be synchronized.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.2: OPS: Data of summoned bots can be synchronized, server operators can sync all players' data.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.3: OPS_AND_SELF: Data of summoned bots and the player's own data can be synchronized, server operators can sync all players' data.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.4: EVERYONE: Data of all players can be synchronized.
carpet.rule.deathskull.desc: When a player dies, a death skull will spawn at the death position, retaining the player's items and half of their experience.
carpet.rule.avoidAnvilTooExpensive.desc: Allows anvil operations even if the experience cost is higher than 40 levels.
carpet.rule.emeraldAttractsVillager.desc: Holding emeralds or emerald blocks attracts villagers. Villagers will approach faster when you hold an emerald block.
carpet.rule.daydream.desc: Allows players to sleep during the day.
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.desc: View a player's inventory by right-clicking on them (you can also use /view command)
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.1: BOT: All players can right-click to view the inventory of summoned bots
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.2: OPS: Players with permission level 2 or higher can right-click to view any player's inventory
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.3: OPS_AND_SELF: Same as "OPS" (Wait, how did you do that???)
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.4: EVERYONE: All players can right-click to view any player's inventory
carpet.rule.fireworkExtensionRecipe.desc: Extend the flight duration of a firework rocket by crafting it with gunpowder. Each gunpowder added increases the duration by 1, with a maximum limit of 255.
